file.name: icir.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Flowchem - flowchem_config
  description: Flowchem is a python library to control a variety of instruments commonly
    found in chemistry labs.
  license:
    name: MIT License
    url: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
  version: 0.1.0a3
paths:
  /icir-local/ir-control/:
    get:
      tags:
      - icir-local
      - icir-local
      summary: Get Metadata
      description: Return metadata.
      operationId: get_metadata_icir_local_ir_control__get
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful Response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ComponentInfo'
  /icir-local/ir-control/acquire-spectrum:
    put:
      tags:
      - icir-local
      - icir-local
      summary: Acquire Spectrum
      description: 'Acquire an IR spectrum.


        Background subtraction performed if treated=True, else a raw scan is returned.'
      operationId: acquire_spectrum_icir_local_ir_control_acquire_spectrum_put
      parameters:
      - required: false
        schema:
          title: Treated
          type: boolean
          default: true
        name: treated
        in: query
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful Response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
        '422':
          description: Validation Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPValidationError'
  /icir-local/ir-control/stop:
    put:
      tags:
      - icir-local
      - icir-local
      summary: Stop
      operationId: stop_icir_local_ir_control_stop_put
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful Response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
  /icir-local/ir-control/spectrum-count:
    get:
      tags:
      - icir-local
      - icir-local
      summary: Spectrum Count
      operationId: spectrum_count_icir_local_ir_control_spectrum_count_get
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful Response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
components:
  schemas:
    ComponentInfo:
      title: ComponentInfo
      required:
      - hw_device
      type: object
      properties:
        hw_device:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceInfo'
        name:
          title: Name
          type: string
          default: ''
        owl_subclass_of:
          title: Owl Subclass Of
          type: string
          default: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/OBI_0000968
      description: Metadata associated with flowchem components.
    DeviceInfo:
      title: DeviceInfo
      required:
      - authors
      - maintainers
      - manufacturer
      - model
      type: object
      properties:
        authors:
          title: Authors
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Person'
        maintainers:
          title: Maintainers
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Person'
        manufacturer:
          title: Manufacturer
          type: string
        model:
          title: Model
          type: string
        additional_info:
          title: Additional Info
          type: object
          default: {}
        backend:
          title: Backend
          type: string
          default: flowchem v. 0.1.0a3
        serial_number:
          title: Serial Number
          type: string
          default: unknown
        version:
          title: Version
          type: string
          default: ''
      description: Metadata associated with hardware devices.
    HTTPValidationError:
      title: HTTPValidationError
      type: object
      properties:
        detail:
          title: Detail
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationError'
    Person:
      title: Person
      required:
      - name
      - email
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          title: Name
          type: string
        email:
          title: Email
          type: string
    ValidationError:
      title: ValidationError
      required:
      - loc
      - msg
      - type
      type: object
      properties:
        loc:
          title: Location
          type: array
          items:
            anyOf:
            - type: string
            - type: integer
        msg:
          title: Message
          type: string
        type:
          title: Error Type
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "DeviceInfo": resolve "#/components/schemas/DeviceInfo": property "additional_info": at docs/api/icir/icir.yml:130:20: parse default: unexpected type: "object"
